title: A comparison of carbon dot and CdTe quantum dot toxicity in Drosophila melanogaster
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00017J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shawninder Chahal, Jun-Ray Macairan, Hoai-Nam N. Bui, Anthony Smith, Hans C. E. Larsson, Rafik Naccache, Nathalie Tufenkji
This work directly compares the toxicity of carbon dots with CdTe quantum dots in Drosophila melanogaster and reveals that the carbon dots are less toxic than the CdTe quantum dots.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
